Class CouponsDBDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • dbdao.CouponsDBDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CouponsDAO

    public class CouponsDBDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements CouponsDAO
    this class handles access to the coupon table CUSTOMERS_VS_COUPONS table and category table
